data.title: With new regulations in effect, applicants can apply to convert multiple cultivation licenses to a Large or Medium cultivation license
data.excerpt: Attention Cultivators: State laws related to cultivation licenses are changing. Effective January 1, 2023, the Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) is accepting: Applications for Large cultivation licenses. Requests to convert other cultivation licenses into a Large or Medium cultivation license. If you hold a Large cultivation license (including as an owner or financial interest holder), […]
data.author: Wes Breazell
